item.title: Spring Update
item.author: thomas@tiveron.ca (Thomas Tiveron)
item.description: Where’s my time going? Hello readers (mom <3), I apologize for my loooong delay between post. I can hardly believe it is already spring time. Whew, time is traveling faster now. What have you been up to so far this year? I hope something awesome! I have been building a desktop application for an engineering firm for stormwater management. On this project, I am on my own, so designer, manager, and developer!
